      private java.util.List<ParameterCategory> categoryStore
      A list designed to contain objects of the ParameterCategory class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ParameterCategoryStore()
      Initializes a new categoryStore, while also assigning it an empty array list where the parameter categories will be stored

      • ParameterCategoryStore

        public ParameterCategoryStore()

    • Method Detail

      • createParameterCategory

        public ParameterCategory createParameterCategory​(java.lang.String code,
                                                 java.lang.String name)
        Initializes a parameter category with a code,name.
        Parameters:
        code - the code of the Parameter Category
        name - the name of the Parameter Category
        Returns:
        returns the created Parameter Category object using the parameters

      • validateParameterCategory

        public boolean validateParameterCategory​(ParameterCategory pc)
        Allows the validation of an existing parameter category and throwing an exception if already inside the store
        Parameters:
        pc - An existing parameter category object
        Returns:
        a boolean statement true if the parameter category is not null and does not exist in the parameter category store, false if not

      • saveParameterCategory

        public boolean saveParameterCategory​(ParameterCategory pc)
        Allows the addition of an validated parameter category to the the list categoryStore of the object ParameterCategoryStore
        Parameters:
        pc - An existing ParameterCategory object
        Returns:
        a boolean statement, true if the parameter category was added successfully to the parameter category store false if not

      • getParameterCategoryByCode

        public ParameterCategory getParameterCategoryByCode​(java.lang.String code)
        Allows the search and return of a parameterCategory using a code String
        Parameters:
        code - string containing a code that identifies a ParameterCategory object
        Returns:
        The ParameterCategory object if found, null if not found

      • getCategoryStore

        public java.util.List<ParameterCategory> getCategoryStore()
        Allows the return of a copy of the list containing parameter categories
        Returns:
        a copy of a list containing parameter categories
